name: GetInboundTransfers
description:
Retrieve inbound transfers for a financial account.

This tool fetches a list of inbound transfers sent from a specified financial account using Stripe's treasury services.

parameters.name: financial_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the FinancialAccount to retrieve associated inbound transfers.

value_schema.description: Returns objects associated with this FinancialAccount.

parameters.name: pagination_ending_before_id
parameters.description: The object ID defining your place in the list to fetch the previous page. Use this for pagination.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: expand_response_fields
parameters.description: List of fields in the response to be expanded for detailed information.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: transfer_limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of inbound transfer objects to return, ranging from 1 to 100. Default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_after_object_id
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination to fetch the next page by using the object ID from the end of the previous result set.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.

parameters.name: filter_by_transfer_status
parameters.description: Filter inbound transfers by their status: 'processing', 'succeeded', 'failed', or 'canceled'.

value_schema.description: Only return InboundTransfers that have the given status: `processing`, `succeeded`, `failed` or `canceled`.
